legacy.full_text:
@danfaggella AI will be better at digital jobs than you. But, crucially, it won't be better at being human than you.

It's sad when we stop thinking this matters

legacy.full_text: @danfaggella I think the one thing you may be missing is that people who use technology more end up having less offspring. This leads to a selection bias against technologists. I think this may select out people who are attracted to technology and AI will stop
